title: Home
inviteHeader: Skole is all about collaboration with your classmates. Invite your friends to join you!
contactHeader: Is your school or subject not yet listed? Contact us and we'll add them!
takeATourHeader: Learn what Skole is all about. By logging in you get the most out of it!
verifyAccountHeader: By verifying your account, you will unlock all features and have the best possible experience using Skole!
completeProfileHeader: By adding your information on your profile you will make your profile look stronger and see more relevant content!
